named-query.name: instrument.getById
named-query.query: SELECT i FROM Instrument i WHERE i.id = :id

named-query.name: instrument.getAll
named-query.query: SELECT i FROM Instrument i WHERE i IN ( SELECT DISTINCT e.instrument FROM Experiment e WHERE e.startDate IS NOT NULL AND e.endDate IS NOT NULL ) ORDER BY i.name ASC

named-query.name: instrument.getAllForUser
named-query.query: SELECT i FROM Instrument i WHERE i IN ( SELECT DISTINCT e.instrument FROM Experiment e JOIN e.users u WHERE u = :user AND e.startDate IS NOT NULL AND e.endDate IS NOT NULL ) ORDER BY i.name ASC

named-native-query.name: instrument.getAllForExperimentsAndInstrumentScientist
named-native-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT i.id, i.name FROM instrument i, experiment e WHERE e.instrument_id = i.id AND e.id in :experimentIds UNION select DISTINCT i.id, i.name FROM instrument i, instrument_scientist ir WHERE ir.instrument_id = i.id AND ir.user_id = :userId

named-native-query.name: instrument.getAllForInstrumentScientist
named-native-query.query: select DISTINCT i.id, i.name FROM instrument i, instrument_scientist ir WHERE ir.instrument_id = i.id AND ir.user_id = :userId
